name: Athanasia Demo
description:
Athanasia is a horror FPS immersive sim, where you are Carmen Flores, a researcher and explorer, called to a mysterious facility in South America where reports of local disappearances and strange phenomena have occurred. Explore to uncover a hidden past, all while battling time traveling creatures from prehistory and the future.

This is the pre alpha demo for the game and content is subject to change as development progresses

Website: https://www.momentumgames.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/momentum_games_

Discord: https://discord.gg/XUfAac8J6h
